name: Androids in Andromeda
description:
/* First off i want to just say i'm rather impressed with what i accomplished, I have only been teaching myself C# and Unity for the last week or so and this is what i made in 72 hours. I made the music, however i can not take credit for any graphics. I found those online*/

I honestly do not know how to describe this game. It is a runner/jumper (you do more jumping then running) Jump from platform to randomly generated platform and see how long you can go for. Have fun, and constructive criticism welcome.

--HeartlessToshiba64
